RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $3,850 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $4, 000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELLAROO tracked the pacesetter into the backstretch while saving ground at the rail, launched her bid from along the inside entering the final turn, and closed determinedly one out from the rail in the drive to take command late and inch clear. ARIKARA away alertly and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, controlled the pace from just off the rail in the run down the backside and into the final turn, was overtaken in mid stretch, but battled gamely to prove clearly second best. WALKINTHEWALK settled at the back of a compact field while saving ground at the rail, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, and finished three out from the rail in the drive to garner a share. BAKFIRE BABY broke sharply and tracked the leader into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied two wide entering the final turn, but lacked the needed closing response when called upon.

ENTRY.NAME: Bellaroo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Arikara
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, closed 3 wide, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bakfire Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Walkinthewalk
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled rail, rallied inside, closed 4 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 15000. (PLUS UP TO $5,250 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, For Each $1,750 To $12,500 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered For Allowances). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SET TO SHINE away well and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, dictated the pace in the run down the backside, sprinted clear entering the final turn, and continued to widen his advantage in the lane while being ridden out late. HE'S RELENTLESS stalked the leader into the backstretch while racing just out from the rail, commenced his bid from along the inside entering the final turn, and battled on willingly from along the rail in the drive to get up for the place. BLACK METAL broke sharply and tracked the pacesetter in the run down the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied two wide while unable to keep pace with the leader entering the final turn, and finished willingly two wide in the drive to garner a share. JUST JIMMY away alertly but steadied sharply off heels entering the first turn, and trailed the compact field into the backstretch, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, but was unable to make a serious late impact while finishing from along the rail in the drive. STAR ENTRY chased the pacesetter three wide entering the first turn to assume a tracking trip two out from the rail in the run down the backside, continued three wide into the final turn, but was outfinished over the final furlong. This race was hand timed

ENTRY.NAME: Just Jimmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, steadied 5/8, trailed, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: He's Relentless
ENTRY.OWNER: Nite and Day Stable and Todd, Joanne
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, rallied rail, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Black Metal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Set to Shine
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, led rail clear lead, widened

ENTRY.NAME: Star Entry
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $4,200 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 3 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sin ce March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, For Each $625 To $5,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZETAMARIE away alertly and tracked the dueling leaders in the run down the backside while racing just out from the rail, commenced her bid from one out from the rail entering the final turn, shifted three wide leaving the turn, and closed determinedly three wide in the drive to get up in the closing strides. QUALITY COMMAND broke sharply and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from along the rail in the run down the backside and into the final turn, got the better of her pace rival leaving the turn, and just failed to last. ARTISTIC JEWLER settled at the back of the field while racing three wide into the backside, rallied five wide entering the final turn, and closed willingly four out from the rail to get up for a share in the final strides. PINEAPPLE TIDBITS stalked the leaders into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, launched her bid three wide entering the final turn, and clsed willingly four wide in the drive. ANOTHERSUNNYDAY away well and dueled for the lead while racing one out from the rail in the run down the backside, rallied two wide from the outside of QUALITY COMMAND entering the final turn, was unable to match strides with that foe leaving the turn, and faded late. JERSEY LILLIE stalked the leaders into the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, rallied four wide from between rivals through the final turn, but weakened in the late stages. Following the running of this race there was a jockey's claim of foul. The rider of PINEAPPLE TIDBITS lodged a claim of foul against the rider of ZETAMARIE for alleged interference leaving the final turn. After review the claim of foul was dismaissed and no change was made to the original order of finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Quality Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, vied rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide, nipped

ENTRY.NAME: Artistic Jewler
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3 wide, rallied 5 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Pineapple Tidbits
ENTRY.OWNER: Musgrove Donald H Spencer Stewart and Johnson Lyle
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Zetamarie
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnson Gary C Hannah Zeta Sharlea Stables and Pumpkin Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked inside, rallied 2w, closed 3w, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Anothersunnyday
ENTRY.OWNER: Leffler Bob Killins Bryan and McCormick Gord
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, dueled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Lillie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, rallied 4 wide, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 25000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 20 Allowed 4 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races Not Considered For Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AIR FORCE away alertly and raced to a narrow advantage from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from the inside of ABOVE AVERAGE in the run down the backstretch and into the final turn, put away her pace rival entering the lane, and drew clear under confident handling. ABOVE AVERAGE broke sharply and pressed the leader one out from the rail entering the first turn, continued to force the issue two wide through the final turn, was unable to match strides with her pace rival entering the lane, but battled willingly one out from the rail in the lane to prove second best. LOVEABOVEANDBEYOND stalked the leaders in the run down the backstretch while saving ground at the rail, launched her bid from along the inside entering the final turn, and closed four wide in the drive to garner a share. MATSQUI unhurried early while dropping back to trail, commenced her bid from along the rail entering the final turn, and found her best stride late while gaining from along the inside in the stretch drive. ADDENDUM away well and tracked the leaders into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but faded in the late stages. This race was hand timed

ENTRY.NAME: Matsqui
ENTRY.OWNER: Renfrew Racing B and B Racing No Trump Stable Elder Matt and Breen Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Loveaboveandbeyond
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked rail, rallied inside, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Air Force
ENTRY.OWNER: Dale Dennis Peter Morris and Welsh Ed
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Above Average
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed 2w, rallied 2w, closed 2w, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Addendum
ENTRY.OWNER: Freedom Farms Ltd Oliver Wayne and Tom Peter
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, tracked 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAKKEN OVERDRIVE away alertly and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, controlled the pace from just off the rail in the run down the backside, held a clear advantage into the final turn, and widened his margin over the final furlong while being kept to task. STORMY BLUE away well, but was allowed to settle off the early pace while saving ground along the inside entering the backstretch, rallied smartly from along the rail entering the final turn, tipped four wide leaving the turn, and closed willingly three out from the rail in the drive to get up for the place. PRINCE CAIRO unhurried early while dropping back to trail entering the backstretch, launched his bid from along the inside entering the final turn, and found his best stride late from along the rail in the drive to get up for a share. AROLLERCOASTERRIDE ducked out at the start, and was forced to chase three wide into the first turn to gain a stalking trip entering the backstretch, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but needed more late while finishing four out from the rail in the drive. EDDIE WHO tracked the pacesetter into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied two wide entering the final turn, but needed more when called upon late. MAJESTIC STREET tracked the leader into the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but failed to respond with a closing kick when called upon.

ENTRY.NAME: Bakken Overdrive
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, clear lead, widened

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, settled inside, rallied rail, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Cairo
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Eddie Who
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Arollercoasterride
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked out start, stalked 3w, rallied 3w, closed 5 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 25000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 1 Allowed 4 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races Not Considered For Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Starte d For Less Than $25,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEGACY SQUARE broke sharply and eased off the leaders midway through the first turn to take a stalking trip one out from the rail entering the backstretch, engaged the leaders three wide entering the final turn, assumed command entering the lane, and quickly disposed of field late while under confident handling. ROCKCLIFFE rushed up between rivals in the run to the first turn to take a narrow advantage, set a pressured pace in the run down the backside and into the final turn, put away his pace rival leaving the turn, but was no match for LEGACY SQUARE entering he lane, but finished willingly from just off the rail in the drive to hold on for the place. TIME TICKER away alertly and was allowed to settle at the back of the field while saving ground entering the backstretch, commenced his bid from along the rail entering the final turn, and finished gamely two wide in the drive to just miss the place. ARISTOCRACY away well and pressed the pace from the outside of ROCKCLIFFE entering the backstretch, forced the issue two wide in the run down the backside and through the final turn, struggled to hold his position leaving the turn, and was outfinished in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Time Ticker
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, settled inside, rallied rail, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Rockcliffe
ENTRY.OWNER: Tod Mountain Thoroughbreds and Redekop James
ENTRY.COMMENT: led rail, rallied inside, closed inside, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Legacy Square
ENTRY.OWNER: Tod Mountain Thoroughbreds and Redekop James
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, stalked 2w, rallied 3w, led, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Aristocracy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, pressed 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, outfinished late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $4,200 THRIF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, For Each $1,000 To $6,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $10,000 BC BRED 3 Yr Old $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORCE TO REKN WITH broke sharply and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from the inside of MILO'S COMMAND entering the backstretch, sprinted to a clear lead approaching the final turn, and continued to widen her margin late while being kept to task. PURSUE lagged well off the early pace while saving ground at the rail entering the backstretch, began to advance smartly midway to the final turn, rallied four wide through the turn, and closed steadily three out from the rail in the drive to prove clearly second best. TEXAS LEGACY settled mid pack while racing three out from the rail entering the backstretch, launched her bid three wide entering the final turn, and finished willingly one out from the rail in the drive to garner a share. MILO'S COMMAND away alertly and pressed the pace from the outside of FORCE TO REKN WITH entering the backstretch, was unable to match strides with his pace rival in the run to the final turn, rallied two wide from between rivals through the turn, and finished from along the rail in the drive. BORROWED EQUITY was slow into stride and raced greenly early while trailing the field into the first turn, rallied with interest one out from the rail entering the final turn, and finished willingly four wide in deep stretch. BARBERRY BANDIT away well and stalked the leaders into the backstretch while racing out from the rail, dropped back in the run down the backside, commenced his bid from along the inside entering the final turn, steadied sharply when running up on heals midway through the turn, shifted three wide entering the lane, but was unable to mount a serious late bid. SETTEBELLO stalked the leaders into the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but faded over the final furlong. WELLSLEY was off a step slow, but saved ground through the first turn to race into a stalking trip entering the backside, continued to save ground entering the final turn, but weakened in the stretch drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Force to Rekn With
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led rail, clear lead, widened

ENTRY.NAME: Barberry Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, stalked 2w, dropped back, rallied rail, steadied 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: Milo's Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed 2w, rallied 2w, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 4 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Borrowed Equity
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride, trailed, rallied 2 wide, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Wellsley
ENTRY.OWNER: Tod Mountain Thoroughbreds and Redekop James
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, stalked rail, rallied inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Pursue
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged rail, advanced 3/8, rallied 4w, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Settebello
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, faded
